iati-activity.title: PeriSan- Sanitation in peri urban areas
iati-activity.description: To support improved and sustainable access to sanitation of 270 poor people from 5 unplanned areas of Ouagadougou -including 124 740 children . This figure represents 67% of people living in informal and peri urban settlements of the capital city.
iati-activity.participating-org: Bureau d'Etudes et de Recherches Appliquées
iati-activity.activity-date: Date that project is due to end
Date that project started to the nearest quarter

contact-info.mailing-address: Open data at WaterAid, 47-49 Durham Street, London, SE11 5JD, UK
